mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.company_id AS "company.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.times AS "times", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o2.name AS "company.name", u3.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_times( id, company_id, user_id, times, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{company.id}, #{user.id}, #{times}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_times SET company_id = #{company.id}, user_id = #{user.id}, times = #{times}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
